title: Startup Founders Podcast Episode 10 – Elyse Petersen, CEO and Founder of Tealet
content: This week, I speak with Elyse Petersen (@PeaceElyse), a founder who's disrupting one of the oldest products in the world – tea. She has an amazing background and some great stories about hustling to get her product in front of the right people. Listen now: Stitcher iTunes RSS Feed I'll be back next week with another episode. Please remember to share this episode with friends and leave us a review on iTunes!
